snippet: Verizon Communications said on Friday that it had agreed to buy Hughes Telematics, a maker of wireless systems for vehicles, for $612 million in cash.
abstract: Verizon Communications said on Friday that it had agreed to buy Hughes Telematics, a maker of wireless systems for vehicles, for $612 million in cash.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Verizon to Buy Hughes Telematics for $612 Million
headline.print_headline: Verizon Acquires a Maker of Wireless Systems
